author: giacomo
msg: First implementation of a rudimentary action framework.
action-sets which holds the definitions of several actions-set.
An action-set holds several actions which can optionally refer to an action suplied from the Environment. Details are explained in the xdocs/drafts/sitemap-working-draft.xmap file.

author: bloritsch
msg: Added hack so that we can have relative paths to builtin-logicsheets

author: bloritsch
msg: Fixed some initialization issues.  We won't have as many Sitemap unavailable problems
any more.  Provided defaults for just about every initial parameter (except force-load and
classpath-attribute which are hacks around differing servlet containers anyway).

author: dims
msg: Bug Fix from Torsten Curdt <tcurdt@dff.st> for xsp:attribute problem.
